movies.title: Rush
movies.plot: A re-creation of the merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.

movies.title: Prisoners
movies.plot: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts. But just how far will this desperate father go to protect his family?

movies.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
movies.plot: Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark become targets of the Capitol after their victory in the 74th Hunger Games sparks a rebellion in the Districts of Panem.

movies.title: Thor: The Dark World
movies.plot: Faced with an enemy that even Odin and Asgard cannot withstand, Thor must embark on his most perilous and personal journey yet, one that will reunite him with Jane Foster and force him to sacrifice everything to save us all.

movies.title: This Is the End
movies.plot: While attending a party at James Franco's house, Seth Rogen, Jay Baruchel and many other celebrities are faced with the apocalypse.

movies.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
movies.plot: The haunted Lambert family seeks to uncover the mysterious childhood secret that has left them dangerously connected to the spirit world.

movies.title: World War Z
movies.plot: United Nations employee Gerry Lane traverses the world in a race against time to stop the Zombie pandemic that is toppling armies and governments, and threatening to destroy humanity itself.

movies.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
movies.plot: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past to change a major historical event that could globally impact man and mutant kind.

movies.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
movies.plot: A mechanic and his daughter make a discovery that brings down Autobots and Decepticons - and a paranoid government official - on them.

movies.title: Now You See Me
movies.plot: An FBI agent and an Interpol detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances and reward their audiences with the money.

movies.title: Gravity
movies.plot: A medical engineer and an astronaut work together to survive after an accident leaves them adrift in space.

movies.title: We're the Millers
movies.plot: A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.

movies.title: Riddick
movies.plot: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, Riddick finds himself up against an alien race of predators. Activating an emergency beacon alerts two ships: one carrying a new breed of mercenary, the other captained by a man from Riddick's past.

movies.title: The Family
movies.plot: The Manzoni family, a notorious mafia clan, is relocated to Normandy, France under the witness protection program, where fitting in soon becomes challenging as their old habits die hard.

movies.title: Star Trek Into Darkness
movies.plot: After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one man weapon of mass destruction.

movies.title: After Earth
movies.plot: A crash landing leaves Kitai Raige and his father Cypher stranded on Earth, a millennium after events forced humanity's escape. With Cypher injured, Kitai must embark on a perilous journey to signal for help.

movies.title: The Great Gatsby
movies.plot: A Midwestern war veteran finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his millionaire neighbor.

movies.title: Divergent
movies.plot: Beatrice Prior, a teenager with a special mind, finds her life threatened when an authoritarian leader seeks to exterminate her kind in her effort to seize control of their divided society.

movies.title: We Are What We Are
movies.plot: The Parkers, a reclusive family who follow ancient customs, find their secret existence threatened as a torrential downpour moves into their area, forcing daughters Iris and Rose to assume responsibilities beyond those of a typical family.

movies.title: Iron Man 3
movies.plot: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.

movies.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
movies.plot: Spider-Man squares off against the Rhino and the powerful Electro while struggling to keep his promise to leave Gwen Stacey out of his dangerous life.

movies.title: Curse of Chucky
movies.plot: After her mother's mysterious death, Nica begins to suspect that the talking, red-haired doll her visiting niece has been playing with may be the key to recent bloodshed and chaos.

movies.title: The Conjuring
movies.plot: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

movies.title: Oldboy
movies.plot: Obsessed with vengeance, a man sets out to find out why he was kidnapped and locked up into solitary confinement for 20 years without reason.

movies.title: Escape Plan
movies.plot: When a structural-security authority finds himself incarcerated in a prison he designed, he has to put his skills to escape and find out who framed him.

movies.title: Elysium
movies.plot: Set in the year 2154, where the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth, a man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.

movies.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
movies.plot: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But he's forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.

movies.title: RoboCop
movies.plot: In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy (Joel Kinnaman) - a loving husband, father and good cop - is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.

movies.title: Carrie
movies.plot: A reimagining of the classic horror tale about Carrie White, a shy girl outcast by her peers and sheltered by her deeply religious mother, who unleashes telekinetic terror on her small town after being pushed too far at her senior prom.

movies.title: The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones
movies.plot: When her mother disappears, Clary Fray learns that she descends from a line of warriors who protect our world from demons. She joins forces with others like her and heads into a dangerous alternate New York called Downworld.

movies.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
movies.plot: Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world and teams up with Natasha Romanoff, aka Black Widow, to battle a powerful yet shadowy enemy in present-day Washington, D.C.

movies.title: Need for Speed
movies.plot: Fresh from prison, a street racer who was framed by a wealthy business associate joins a cross country race with revenge in mind. His ex-partner, learning of the plan, places a massive bounty on his head as the race begins.

movies.title: Runner Runner
movies.plot: When a poor college student who cracks an online poker game goes bust, he arranges a face-to-face with the man he thinks cheated him, a sly offshore entrepreneur.

movies.title: I Spit on Your Grave 2
movies.plot: Unknown

movies.title: Battle of the Year
movies.plot: Battle of the Year attracts all the best teams from around the world, but the Americans haven't won in fifteen years. Dante enlists Blake to assemble a team of the best dancers and bring the Trophy back to America where it started.

movies.title: Behind the Candelabra
movies.plot: Based on the autobiographical novel, the tempestuous 6-year relationship between Liberace and his (much younger) lover, Scott Thorson, is recounted.

movies.title: No se Aceptan Devoluciones
movies.plot: A man who has made a new life for himself and the daughter left on his doorstep 6 years ago finds his family threatened when the birth mother resurfaces.

movies.title: The Bling Ring
movies.plot: Inspired by actual events, a group of fame-obsessed teenagers use the internet to track celebrities' whereabouts in order to rob their homes.

movies.title: Furious 6
movies.plot: Hobbs has Dom and Brian reassemble their crew in order to take down a mastermind who commands an organization of mercenary drivers across 12 countries. Payment? Full pardons for them all.

movies.title: Machete Kills
movies.plot: The U.S. government recruits Machete to battle his way through Mexico in order to take down an arms dealer who looks to launch a weapon into space.

movies.title: 12 Years a Slave
movies.plot: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

movies.title: The World's End
movies.plot: Five friends who reunite in an attempt to top their epic pub crawl from 20 years earlier unwittingly become humankind's only hope for survival.

movies.title: Pitch Perfect
movies.plot: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her school's all-girls singing group. Injecting some much needed energy into their repertoire, The Bellas take on their male rivals in a campus competition.

movies.title: Epic
movies.plot: A teenager finds herself transported to a deep forest setting where a battle between the forces of good and the forces of evil is taking place. She bands together with a rag-tag group characters in order to save their world -- and ours.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.plot: Nick Fury of S.H.I.E.L.D. assembles a team of superhumans to save the planet from Loki and his army.

movies.title: Metallica Through the Never
movies.plot: Trip, a young roadie for Metallica, is sent on an urgent mission during the band's show. But what seems like a simple assignment turns into a surreal adventure.

movies.title: Oblivion
movies.plot: A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.

movies.title: Dom Hemingway
movies.plot: After spending 12 years in prison for keeping his mouth shut, notorious safe-cracker Dom Hemingway is back on the streets of London looking to collect what he's owed.

movies.title: The Hangover Part III
movies.plot: When one of their own is kidnapped by an angry gangster, the Wolf Pack must track down Mr. Chow, who has escaped from prison and is on the lam.

movies.title: Despicable Me 2
movies.plot: Gru is recruited by the Anti-Villain League to help deal with a powerful new super criminal.

movies.title: The Butler
movies.plot: As Cecil Gaines serves eight presidents during his tenure as a butler at the White House, the civil rights movement, Vietnam, and other major events affect this man's life, family, and American society.

movies.title: Dumb and Dumber To
movies.plot: 20 years after the dimwits set out on their first adventure, they head out in search of one of their long lost children in the hope of gaining a new kidney.

movies.title: Blue Jasmine
movies.plot: A New York socialite, deeply troubled and in denial, arrives in San Francisco to impose upon her sister. She looks a million, but isn't bringing money, peace, or love...

movies.title: Ender's Game
movies.plot: 70 years after a horrific alien war, an unusually gifted child is sent to an advanced military school in space to prepare for a future invasion.

movies.title: White House Down
movies.plot: While on a tour of the White House with his young daughter, a Capitol policeman springs into action to save his child and protect the president from a heavily armed group of paramilitary invaders.

movies.title: Pain & Gain
movies.plot: A trio of bodybuilders in Florida get caught up in an extortion ring and a kidnapping scheme that goes terribly wrong.

movies.title: 2 Guns
movies.plot: A DEA agent and a naval intelligence officer find themselves on the run after a botched attempt to infiltrate a drug cartel. While fleeing, they learn the secret of their shaky alliance: Neither knew that the other was an undercover agent.

movies.title: The Dark Knight Rises
movies.plot: Eight years on, a new evil rises from where the Batman and Commissioner Gordon tried to bury it, causing the Batman to resurface and fight to protect Gotham City... the very city which brands him an enemy.

movies.title: The Place Beyond the Pines
movies.plot: A motorcycle stunt rider turns to robbing banks as a way to provide for his lover and their newborn child, a decision that puts him on a collision course with an ambitious rookie cop navigating a department ruled by a corrupt detective.

movies.title: Fast & Furious 7
movies.plot: After Dominic Toretto and his crew helped take down Owen Shaw, his brother Ian Shaw now wants revenge.

movies.title: jOBS
movies.plot: The story of Steve Jobs' ascension from college dropout into one of the most revered creative entrepreneurs of the 20th century.

movies.title: Disconnect
movies.plot: A drama centered on a group of people searching for human connections in today's wired world.

movies.title: Bridesmaids
movies.plot: Competition between the maid of honor and a bridesmaid, over who is the bride's best friend, threatens to upend the life of an out-of-work pastry chef.

movies.title: Man of Steel
movies.plot: A young itinerant worker is forced to confront his secret extraterrestrial heritage when Earth is invaded by members of his race.

movies.title: Ghost Team One
movies.plot: Two roommates deathly afraid of ghosts both fall in love with a girl who believes their home is haunted.
